dcterms:description: The ICDAR 2013 Segmentation dataset provides per-character segmentation of scene text, specifically designed for the ICDAR 2013 Robust Reading Competition, focusing on letters and ignoring punctuations and digits.
dcterms:title: ICDAR 2013 Segmentation dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Karatzas
F. Shafait
S. Uchida
M. Iwamura
L. Gomez i Bigorda
S. Robles Mestre
J. Mas
D. Fernandez Mota
J. Almazan Almazan
L.-P. de las Heras
dcterms:description: The ICDAR 2013 Recognition dataset is part of the ICDAR 2013 Robust Reading Competition, focusing on recognizing text in real-world images, specifically designed for evaluating scene text recognition methods.
dcterms:title: ICDAR 2013 Recognition dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Wang
S. Belongie
dcterms:description: The Street View Text (SVT) dataset consists of images harvested from Google Street View, exhibiting high variability and often low resolution, created for lexicon-driven word recognition.
dcterms:title: Street View Text (SVT) dataset
